versions.title: 4G Coverage
versions.summary: Percentage of geographic areas with 4G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 105dBm), UK, September 2022.
versions.description: This dataset shows the percentage of geographic areas with 4G signal outdoors from at least 1 operator (signal threshold: 105dBm), in the UK, for September 2022.

columns.name: period
columns.description: The time period associated with the observation.

columns.name: areacd
columns.description: The geography code associated with the observation.

columns.name: areanm
columns.description: The name assiciated with the geography code.

columns.name: geography
columns.description: The categorisation of the geography code

columns.name: observation
columns.titles: Geographic area with 4G coverage by at least one provider
columns.description: Observation value of geographic area with 4G coverage by at least one provider

columns.name: measure
columns.description: Measure type of the observation value

columns.name: lower_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, lower bound

columns.name: upper_confidence_interval_95
columns.description: The interval estimate gives an indication of how much uncertainty there is in our estimate of the true mean, upper bound

columns.name: observation_status
columns.description: Additional context to the observation value if needed
